Text: Email Notification from the UCB Library Cc NonPrivilegedpst Email Notification of Library Holds and Recalls Is Now Available The UCB Library has implemented an email notification feature into the circulation system This permits students and faculty to be notified quickly by email when a book is overdue or when a recalled book has become available Log on to the Patron Update webpage at patronupdate to see if your email address is correct then click the yes button to activate this feature This is a service that a group of Haas operations research students studied and make recommendations about several years ago Milt Ternberg Long Business Economics Library
